law.catch_line: Exemption of drugs compounded in a pharmacy.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 217.907 to 217.917 shall not apply to drug products compounded by a pharmacist licensed pursuant to KRS Chapter 315, in a pharmacy operating under a permit as required by KRS 315.035.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982.
